parameters.query: SELECT dataset_id, external_id, last_updated, update_frequency, metadata->>'version' as version FROM datasets WHERE source_type = 'ONS' AND NOT deleted_at IS NOT NULL

WITH stats AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_records,
    MIN(period_start) as oldest_data,
    MAX(period_start) as newest_data
  FROM data_records 
  WHERE dataset_id = '{{$('split-batches').first().json.id}}'
    AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
),
current_dataset AS (
  SELECT dataset_id, row_count 
  FROM datasets 
  WHERE external_id = '{{$('split-batches').first().json.id}}'
)
UPDATE datasets 
SET 
  last_updated = NOW(),
  row_count = COALESCE((SELECT total_records FROM stats), 0) + COALESCE(row_count, 0),
  metadata = jsonb_set(
    COALESCE(metadata, '{}'),
    '{last_ingestion}',
    json_build_object(
      'records_added', COALESCE((SELECT total_records FROM stats), 0),
      'oldest_data', (SELECT oldest_data FROM stats),
      'newest_data', (SELECT newest_data FROM stats),
      'batch_id', '{{$('split-batches').first().json.batch_id}}',
      'version', '{{$('split-batches').first().json.version}}',
      'ingestion_timestamp', NOW(),
      'status', 'completed'
    )::jsonb
  )
WHERE external_id = '{{$('split-batches').first().json.id}}'
RETURNING 
  dataset_id,
  external_id,
  last_updated,
  row_count,
  metadata->'last_ingestion' as last_ingestion_info;
